mapper.select: select member.member_code,member.id,user_tb.name,user_tb.path,user_tb.phone,user_tb.email,user_tb.intro,user_tb.gender from member,user_tb where member.id=user_tb.id and study_code=#{value} and join_status='0002'
mapper.delete: delete from member where member_code=#{memberCode} and study_code=#{studyCode}
mapper.select: select id from member where member_code=#{_parameter}
mapper.insert: insert into send_message values(SEND_MESSAGE_SEQ.nextval,#{sendId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{recvId}, sysdate, null, null)
mapper.update: update member set join_status='0004', grade='0146' where member_code=#{memberCode} and study_code=#{studyCode}
